title: ZK I Zettel 7,2m26a - Niklas Luhmann-Archiv
body:
7,2m26a
					Allgemeine Belege aus der Literaturzum Problem der Wertwiderspr√ºche Rose, S. 7: "This is made possible [?] by the fact [?] thatvalues are sometimes unconscions [?] and by thefact that man sometimes [?] thinks in logic-tight [?]compartments". In mehrfacher Beziehung Unsinn. Hinweis auf Robert S. Lynd, Knowledge forWhat, Princeton 1939, S. 60-62 I. Chein, M. Deutsch, H. Hyman (eds.), Consistencyand Inconsistency in Intergroup Relations,Journal of Social Issues 5 (1949)
